short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find YouTube videos from your selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use to quickly search for YouTube videos using your selected text.

To use, select the text you would like to use to search YouTube. Then, right click or Ctrl+click and select the menu option, "Find Video Content."

A popup window will appear containing YouTube results for the selected text.
